The crucial problem with the pyramids is
how the masonry was lifted to such a
great height some think that ramps of
soda and salt were piled up against the
structure as it was built then after its
completion those ramps were dissolved
flooded by water from the river others
believe that elevated Bridges were built
of mud bricks and when the work was
finished the bricks were taken by people
to build their houses
but another method is thought to be
